title: Fix Home resume download CTA to reliably open the intended PDF

requirements.summary: Serve the resume PDF as a static public asset and ensure the Home “Download Resume” CTA opens it reliably in a new tab/window on deployed builds.
acceptanceCriteria: A resume PDF exists as a static file in the frontend public assets and is accessible via an absolute path (e.g., /assets/Anuj_Chaudhary_Resume.pdf) in production builds.
Clicking “Download Resume” opens the PDF file in the browser (new tab/window acceptable) without console errors.
The behavior works after deployment on the Internet Computer (not only in local dev).

file_operations.description: Add the intended resume PDF as a static public asset so it is served directly at the absolute path /assets/Anuj_Chaudhary_Resume.pdf in production builds.

Replace the current programmatic download-anchor logic with a normal link-style CTA that navigates to /assets/Anuj_Chaudhary_Resume.pdf and opens it in a new tab/window (e.g., anchor with target="_blank" and appropriate rel), ensuring the click does not fail silently after IC deployment and produces no console errors.
